BUENTAXI: Buen Taxi is a mobile application that allows people of santa marta, tourists or foreigners:
COTIZARELPRECIO: Quote the price of the ride at any time
CONOCERLAINFO: Know the information of the vehicle and driver that transports you
COMPARTIRLOS: Share the information of the cab in which you are traveling with other people
ESDOMINGO: Is it Sunday or a holiday?
SERVICIOS: Service requested by call or App?
RECARGOSALIDATERMINAL: Surcharge for departure from the transportation terminal
RECARGOMOTELES: Surcharge, departure and entry of motels
RECARGOLLAMADA: Service charge per call and app
EN24HORAS: Error, in 24 hours you can qualify again
ERRORRUTA: Error in the chosen route, try again
ERRORORIGEN: The selected place of origin location is not in our legal working areas.
ERRORDESTINO: The selected destination is not in our legal working areas.
POSICIONNOVALIDA: You are out of our zones
TUSOLICITUD: Your request is being processed, thank you very much for using our services.
TUSOLICITUDERROR: There was an error processing your request, please try again.
